data.text: @RepLaTurner Jake call me so we can go over this. These drugs are not coming from the southern border. They are coming from within the United States produced by drug manufacturers. Do you have a staff that informs you?
@RepLaTurner Why not look into what’s making people want to use drugs?
@RepLaTurner So the system is working to catch this drug imports is what you are saying?
@RepLaTurner actually create massive addiction issues. Oh and legalizing marijuana would stop a huge flow of illegal 'drugs' from flowing.
@RepLaTurner Hey intern typing these, his job is to do something about issues not sit on the sidelines and "try" to coach.
@RepLaTurner All GOP are morons!  Congratulations yet again to the Biden administration for this massive fentanyl seizure.

@RepLaTurner The fentanyl issue is a direct product of the opioid epidemic. You keep posting the same thing over and over about a byproduct without possible solutions to the root cause. This has been you MO since you’ve been elected. Partisan complaints and no ideas to help.
@RepLaTurner Talking points from the Party of Boebert & Greene!
